DataElement.preferredName: CyberKnife And IMRT Therapy Actual Dose Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value representing the total planned dose for a Cyberknife plus IMRT treatment, expressed as a number of Gy (gray) units.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: CyberKnife And IMRT Therapy Actual Dose

Concepts.definition: A proprietary, robotic radiosurgery system designed to deliver precise beams of high dose radiation to tumors with extreme accuracy.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.

An advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy (3D CRT) that involves the use of varying intensities of small radiation beams to produce dosage distributions that are more precise than those possible with 3D CRT.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Existing in fact; real. (from American Heritage Dictionary):The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.

Concepts.definition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
